info.senderName: NWS Wakefield (Eastern Virginia and Southern Maryland)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued August 11 at 8:03PM EDT by NWS Wakefield
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of west central Prince Edward County through 845 PM EDT... At 802 PM EDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm over Appomattox, moving southeast at 15 mph. HAZARD...Winds in excess of 30 mph and heavy rain. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Heavy rain could result in localized ponding of water on roadways. This strong thunderstorm will be near... Darlington Heights around 845 PM EDT. Other locations impacted by this storm include Elam and Allens Mill. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...30 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
